snippet: Michael Shannon, Reed Birney and Merritt Wever will be in the cast of Annie Baker's adaptation of the Chekhov play.
abstract: Michael Shannon, Reed Birney and Merritt Wever will be in the cast of Annie Baker's adaptation of the Chekhov play.

headline.main: Downtown Stage Stars (a Few With TV Credits) Will Populate 'Uncle Vanya'
headline.print_headline: Michael Shannon in Cast For New ‘Uncle Vanya’
